snippet: The Republican incumbent in Westchester, Rob Astorino, defeated his Democratic challenger, and Edward P. Mangano won in Nassau.
abstract: Two of the wealthiest counties in the nation, both with New York voters worried about property tax increases, decide to stick with Republican county executives who held the line on taxes, keeping Rob Astorino in Westchester and Edward P Mangano in Nassau.
lead_paragraph: The Republican incumbent in Westchester, Rob Astorino, defeated his Democratic challenger, and Edward P. Mangano won in Nassau.

headline.main: Two New York Counties Re-elect G.O.P. Executives
headline.print_headline: Two Wealthy Counties Re-elect Republican Executives
